div.p:
In the court haldin in the tolbuthe of abirdene be the ballies of the samen the xiiij dai
of marche the yer' et cetera lxxxiiij the assise has deliuerit that Duncan rogh in tulch is
quyte of the clame of ane ox clamyt be thom thomson duelland in the tempil
hous' of badfothel

the samyn dai the assise has deliuerit that thom symson sal pay and content til Jhone of
lammynton' xxiiij s' within terme of law

the aldirman and consel has fundin and deliuerit that maistir William anffray has na rycht
tooccupy a tail of robert prattis land rekand fra the hede of the said robertis
yard to the kingis gate on the eist part / for ocht that thai haf sene hiddirtillis in the
contrar'
Curia tenta per ballivos in pretorio xviij die mensis marcij predicti /

quo die cowy cordonarius conuictus
per assisam adiudicatur in amerciamento pro iniusta perturbacione et lesione michaelis ranyson et emen
dabit eidem ad visum proborum virorum Et dictus michael in amerciamento pro perturbio eiusdem cowy
Andreas ranyson in amerciamento quia perturbavit dictum cowy in verbo et cetera

Curia legalis tenta per balliuos burgi de Abirdene in pretorio eiusdem xxjo die marcij anno
Dominj supradicto /

quo die thomas piot tercio die vocatus ad sectam patricij badenach non comparuit precipitur
Duncano straloch seriando / quod capto districto ab eodem ipsum summoneat ad proximum diem legalem tanquam quartum
et peremptorium diem processus

the action persewit be alexander marr' againis Dauid marr' be a borgh / was put til ane
assise / quhilk deliuerit that sen the said borgh concernit commpt and rekning / thai couthe nocht
as than decide tharupon / quhil thai had commptit and reknit / and that the borgh war strekit
apon a certane some'

the samen dai Alexander marr' strekit ane borgh in the hand of alexander chamer seriand / that
Dauid marr' withhaldis wranguisly fra him the some' of fyve pundis to the quhilk borch
the seriand sayd he warnit the said David toansuer' the next lachful dai

xxiiij die mensis marcij supradicto In curia ballivorum Ricardus Wrycht posuit se in voluntate ballivorum
de iniusta perturbacione et percussione Willelmi Wrycht / et emendabit eidem ad visum proborum
Et assisa reperit quod dictus Ricardus excessit contra Walterum achneve in verbis iniuriosis que as
sisa ordinavit quod ipse Ricardus dabit pro vtroque defectu in partem emende j libr' cere ad lumen
beati nicholai Et penes quandam bipennem clamatam pro Willelmum Wrycht / dictus Ricardus veniet die
Juridico post pascha ad inde faciendum quod de Jure tenetur et cetera

the xxvj dai of marche the yer' of god et cetera lxxxv gilbert the vaus thom prat thom
of chamer Sym of crafurd William moyses Richart hil the fadir R hil the son Johne
chepman and Dauid galychtlie sworn in assise fand and deliuerit that al the baxtaris within this
burgh had forfautit and wrangit to the toune becaus' thai made nocht redy stuf and
brede toserve the toun like as thai had in command' be the ballies of before and as thai
suld haf done of thare office / quharfor thai and ilkane of thaim was adiugit in
amerciament of the court and til amend in tyme tocum et cetera

The xxviij dai of marche the yer' of god et cetera lxxxv / gilbert the vaus becom souerty til
entir Jhone fichet in the tolbuthe before the ballies ane or ma the morn in the hour' of
caus' et cetera

Duncan leis convict be assise is adiugit in amerciament for the wrangwis' brekin of cowy
cordonaris veschel and strublin of the said cowy in the downe casting of wattir apon
him til amend as law wil And the said Duncan has fundin henry bawne
law borgh that the said cowy and his party salbe vnscathit of him and his party in tyme
tocum vthirwais than be way of law / And androw culan yungar is becumin law borgh
for the said cowy and his party / that Duncan leis and his party salbe vnscathit in like wis'

the vj dai of aprile the yer' forsaid the counsale and certane of the communite chargit Alexander
rede and androw branche twa of the ballies to command Robert blindsel to desist fra the
occupacion of ane half nettis fisching of the raik quhilk he occupiit in the name of
maistir Androw cadiow vnto the tyme that he schew rycht and sufficent power' til occupy the
samyn And gif it hapnyt the said balyeis tobe summond before our Souerane lord and his
consale or vthirwais inquiet anent the said charge / that the toune sal defend thame and re
leve thaim off al skath / And thareftir the said ballies at the command' of the toune / char
git Robert blindsel todesist fra the occupiing of the said demj nett vnto the tym that he
schew quhat Right he had to occupy the said fisching et cetera

The vij dai of the said moneth of aprile the hail communite beand gadirit be publik
premunicion of the belman and warning of the officeris / has consentit tilbe extentit to
the some' of xl merkis for thare part of the taxt / quhilk was ordanit tilhaf bene
pait to the expens' of certane ambaxiatouris quhilkis past in Ingland for the tretting
and concluding of pece nochtwithsanding that the samyn tax was pait be the communite of before
and deliuerit til ser Jhon' of ruthirfurd aldirman for the tym And for the eschewing
of the recognicion of the fredom' of this burgh the communite grantit til a new tax as
said is And for the taxacion of the samyn thai haf chosin James lesly Jhon Wormot
Dauid mathoson gilbert the vaus androw murray eldar Robert prat Jhone glenmaluin
Richart of culan and robert crag and androw Wentoun

Jhone of hil is adiugit in amerciament for the wranguis' passing of his hors' apon ser Jhone
striuelinis croft of quhete and til amend as law wil et cetera

Curia capitalis burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio per prepositum et balliuos eiusdem
xjo die Aprilis anno Dominj et cetera lxxxv quo die sectis vocatis et curia affirmata
absentes patent in rotulo sectis videlicet Willelmus de carnequhin Willelmus portar David rury
andreas murison Duncanus ydil

div.head: Inquisicio
div.p:
Jacobus lesly de petkapil Johannes de Knollis gilbertus vaus andreas culan senior
Walterus achneve Willelmus malisson Ricardus culan Johannes glenmaluin Robertus prat Willelmus
hay Ranaldus talyour Willelmus gray et Robertus crag burgenses dicti burgi Quj Jurati dicunt
quod quondam Alexander Kintor auus henrici chawmer latoris presencium obiit vltimo vestitus
et sasitus ut de feodo ad pacem et fidem domini nostri Regis de quadam terra vasta cum
pertinenciis Jacente infra burgum de Abirdene in vico nauium inter terram alexandri coupar
ex parte boriali et terram gilberti murison ex australi parte / de vno crofto Jacente
iuxta li crabstane inter croftum Johannis culan ex parte orientali et croftum hered' cuiusdam
Kynninmond ex occidentali parte / de vno annuo redditu iiijor solidorum de terra quondam thome
benyn Jacente in vico nauium /. de v s' et iiij d' annuj redditus de terra quondam Roberti
boyd in vico inferiori ecclesie / Et de viij s' annuj redditus de terra quondam Johannis
Wellis in vico de futy Jacente / Et quod dictus henricus est vnus de tribus le
gitimis et propinquioribus heredibus eiusdem quondam alexandri aui suj de dictis terra / crofto et annu
is redditibus cum pertinenciis / et quod tenetur habere terciam partem eorundem / et est legittime etatis
Et quod dicta terra cum pertinenciis valet nunc per annum vnam marcam et tantum valuit tempore
pacis Et croftum predictum cum pertinenciis valet nunc per annum duas marcas et tantum tempore
pacis / de valore annuorum redditum superius patet / Et quod dicti terra / croftum et
annuj redditus cum pertinencijs tenentur in capite de domino nostro Rege in libero burgagio Et
quod tercia pars eorundem nunc existit in manibus domini nostri Regis legittime per seipsum / a
tempore obitus Mariote sponse quondam dicti Alexandri Kyntor que fuit in coniuncta infeodacione
terre / crofti et annuorum reddituum predictorum / que obiit per spacium duorum annorum preteritorum
vel eocirca In defectu dicti henrici Jus suum minime prosequentis

It was deliuerit be certane warkmen masonis and vthiris sworn betuix Richart
hil and Wil coupar anens the bigging of a land of the said Richardis / that Ri
chard hil sal deliuer and pay in continent to Wil coupar ten s' / and thare salbe
biggit a spoute betuix the said richard and Williamis land apon baith
thare expens' sufficient for saufety of baith thare landis

Alexander hay tuke to prefe within xv dais / that Wil philp / gef dais of pay
ment to the man that acht him a certane of siluer / for the quhilk the said alexander
com souerte to the said Wil philp

The assise has ordanit / that Copyn andreis skippar sal mak rekning and
payment til Duncan smyth and til the wideu of Richart Kyntor of twa barrellis
of salmond in twa pety quartaris of salt gif the said salmond extendis tharto / and gif it be
mare than the twa pety quartaris todeliuer the lave in stofis / and that the skippar sal mak
the said rekning and payment in salt and stofis as salmond was sald now last in the feyr
And he is in amerciament becaus' he fulfillit nocht thare paper

head.add: Judicio processus pro domino David vaus

div.p:
Eodem die dominus Dauid Waus capellanus ac procurator altaris beate marie magdalene in
ecclesia beati Nicholai de abirdene / protestatus fuit pro vno annuo Redditu quinque solidorum de
quadam terra in vico viridi vt in precedentibus rotulamentis / et accedens ad eandem nichil reperit
ad distringendum pro dicto annuo redditu nisi terram et lapides quos presentauit in curia
tanquam quarta die huius processus / testibus Dauid galychtlie henrico lorn et philipo Dunbrek seriendo
Et deinde perlectis aliis tribus processibus precedentibus ductis per dictum dominum Dauid Waus
super Recuperacione proprietatis et possessionis illius terre Jacentis in vico viridi inter terram
dicti domini Dauid ex boriali parte / et terram quondam patricij coupar ex australi parte / ob non solu
cionem predicti annuj redditus quinque solidorum dicto altari debit' et a longo tempore insolut'
dictus dominus Dauid peciit a balliuis secundum formam suj processus precedentis Juris et Justi
cie complementum / Vnde hora diei legittima expectata / decretum fuit per curiam et datum
pro Judicio per os Willelmi modan Judicatoris curie / quod dictus dominus Dauid procuratorio
nomine eiusdem altaris Recuperauit proprietatem et possessionem dicte terre cum pertinencijs in defectu
solucionis annuj redditus prenotati Teste curia

Dominus Johannes sterling capellanus altaris beate Katherine in ecclesia parrochiali Abirdenensis
accessit ad barram et protestatus fuit pro quodam annuo redditu quinque solidorum dicto
altari debit' de vna terra Jacente in vico viridi inter terram alexandri de camera ex
parte boreali / et terram gilberti murison ex parte australi et communem viam regiam ex oc
cidentali parte Ad quam terram accedens nichil inuenit distringibile preter terram et lapides
quos presentauit in curia tanquam primo die huius processus testibus Dauid galichtly henrico
lorn et philippo de Dunbrek seriendo desuper Juratis et examinatis

Dauid marr' super quem Alexander marr' extendit plegium pro iniusta detencione quinque librarum
primo die vocatus ad respondendum non comparuit / precipitur alexandro chamer seriendo quod capto districto
ad eodem Dauid / ipsum summoneat ad proximam curiam legalem tanquam 2m diem huius placiti

Thomas pyot pro quarto et die peremptorio vocatus ad respondendum plegio super eum porrecto per
patricium badenagh pro iniusta detencione centum bigarum precalium li ploddis nuncupat' non comparuit
Vnde decretum fuit per curiam et datum pro Judicio / quod dictus patricius deuenit ad clameum suum
aduersus thomam pyot de dictis precalibus causa non defensa / et satisfaciet eidem
infra terminum Juris Et est in iiijor amerciamentis pro absencia sua ab ista et tribus
curiis precedentibus

The samyn dai Duncan cristison in tulynestin summond be the president and cheptour of abirdenis
lettres tobere witnes in the caus' arbitrale betuix Dauid galichtlie and William blindsel
comperit before Dauid menyeis ane of the ballies in presence of the said Williamis modir and
William moyses warnit tocomper' for the said William blindsel becaus' of his absence
quhilk Duncan sworn deponit and declarit / that the said William blindselis modir tuke
payment fra him on Dauid galychtliis behalf of twa stan' of wol the tym of the curs'
of the first blak money / And the said Williamis modir grantis that scho lowsit the said
Duncan put in the tolbuthe at the instance of Dauid galychtlie for ij stan' of wol / and that
scho tuke payment fra him tharof on hir sonnys behalf eftir hir husbandis deces'
And this thai bath opinly declarit before James lesly androw branche ser Robert le
is notar androw atkyn and vthiris diuers' witnes
Curia tenta per balliuos de abirdene in pretorio xiiijto die Aprilis anno Domini et cetera lxxxvto

quo die Simon de gardin conuictus per assisam adiudicatur in amerciamento pro iniusta perturbacione
Johannes Glenmalvin et emendabit eidem ad visum proborum virorum
Item murthacus glenmaluin in amerciamento pro perturbio dicti Simonis de gardin et emendabit et cetera

Thomas prat deuenit plegius legalis pro Simone gardyn quod Johannes glenmaluin
et murthacus glenmalvin erunt indempnes pro eo et parte sua aliter quam per viam Juris
Et dicti Johannes et murthacus inuenerunt Dauid mathoson plegium legalem pro eiiseis et
parte sua de indempnitate dicti Simonis gardyn vt supra

The xviij dai of the forsaid moneth of aprile / malcum lesly convict be the assise is
in amerciament for the wranguis' takin of george brownis keyis and aw torestore thaim

Item the said george in amerciament for the wranguis' taking of the said malcum bruthiris
bonet / and sal restore the samyn et cetera

The counsale and communite has consentit and ordanit for the bigging of thare organys
that al nolt scheip and swyne within the toune be stentit and taxit at the avise of the
aldirman and certane persons tobe chosin tharuppon

The samyn dai the Aldirman ballies counsale and communite beand gadirit in the tolbuthe
be oppyn warning of the bel and common belman passand diuers' tymes thruch al
the toune . Riply avisit for profitabil caus' concerning thaim and specialy for the payment
of fourty merkis of taxt set apon the toune for contribucion til the expens' of ane
ambaxate past in Ingland for gude of pees' nocht lang syne / has giffin and grantit
the office of common clerkschip of this burgh of Abirdene quhat tyme it sal
happyn to vaik

The xix dai of aprile yer' of god et cetera lxxxv / Wat thomson was adiugit in ij amerciamentis
for the wrangwis' breking of Wil grais wal / and for strublance of androw murra eldar
and til amend as law wil et cetera

The xx dai of Aprile the yer' of god et cetera lxxxv the ballies has warnit and chargit
Alexander of chavmer aldirman and John' of Knollis tocompere before thaim on monundai the
xxv dai of this instant aprile til answer' at the instance of mastir Androw cadiow anent
ane obligacion producit in Jugement as law wil et cetera

The xxv dai of the said moneth of aprile / the action persewit be maistir Androw cadiow
againis Alexander of chavmer aldirman Jhone of Knollis alexander of chamer the son and vm
quhile Dauid colison' twiching ane obligacion of warrandice of ane half nettis
fisching of the Raik / Is continuit becaus' this dai was nocht lachful / quhil Wednis
dai the xxvij dai of this instant moneth of aprile / And the ballies has gert warn
bath the saidis parties tocomper' before thaim the said dai / for the ministracion of Justice in the
said matir eftir the tenour of our' Souerane lordis lettrez

In the court haldin be Alexander rede and androw branche twa of the ballies of abirdene
in the tolbuthe of the samyn the xxvij dai of aprile the yer' forsaid / Comperit
maistir Androw cadiow and present our Souerane lordis lettres direct to the ballies for the
ministracion of Justice anent ane half nettis fisching of the Raik on the wattir
of Dee / clamit be the said maistir androw tobe warandit / til him / be Jhone of Knollis /
vmquhile Dauid colisone / Alexander chavmer eldar and alexander chavmer his son' be ane
obligacion producit in Jugement be the said maistir androw The quhilkis Johne / alexander
and alexander warnit and comperit at the instance of the said maistir Androw toanswer'
til the said obligacion thai beand inquirit be the saidis balyeis of the warrandis' of
the said half nettis fisching clamit be the said mastir Androw in Jugement / denyit the
warrandis' of the said half nettis fisching be vertu of the said obligacione
and offerit thaim til vndirly the decision of ane assise tharanent before thar
Jugis ordinar' / And bath the parties removit / the hail court of the best and worthi
ast of the toune present for the tym inquirit seueraly be morice besat and philp of Dun
brek seriandis / quhethir the said action debatabil suld be put to the deter
minacion of ane assise or nocht / the quhilkis avisit decretit and deliuerit / that the
said action suld be put til the knaulage of ane assise before the saidis
ballies / And thareftir the said action was put til ane assise of thir personis
vndirwritin that is tosay / James lesly William blindsel Jhone Wormot
thomas prat Adam of crafurd Dauid mathoson' alexander the hay Dauid sym
son Jhone stevinson William moyses James craik gilbert the vaus thomas
marr' Robert prat and Sym of gardyn / And James lesly forspekar for
the assis' inquirit at maistir Androw cadiow gif he had ony maa lettres or evi
dentis than the said obligacion concerning the said action the quhilk maistir Andro
opinly declarit / that he had na mare lettres nor evidentis vppon that matir
And in like wis' the saidis alexander of chamer eldar Jhon' of Knollis and alexander chamer
the sone / opinly declarit that thai had nor wyst of na lettres nor evidentis belang
ing the said caus' / The quhilk assise the gret aith sworn in presence of the parties
has continuit this action to this dai viij dais the ferd day of maij / quhil thai
haf commovnit with certane personis of the quhilkis bath the parties ar' content et cetera

The samyn dai before the ballies in Jugement / maistir Androw cadiow has constitute and
ordanit Robert blindsel and ser William cadiow coniunctly and seueralie his lachful
procuratouris in the action forsaid concerning the demj nettis fisching of the Raik / and in
al vthir actionis concerning him todo and defend for him like as he mycht do in propir
person / And has promittit tohald ferm and stabil in the sickerast fourm of procuratory et cetera

the penult dai of aprile It is ordanit and decretit be the Aldirman ballies and consale
that maistir androw cadiow sal gif his answer' the morn to the toune quhethir that he sal
fynd marrowschip til alexander of marr' of demj net of the mydchingil or nocht / or gif he
allegis that he has right til the said half net / or nocht / to the quhilkis the saide
maistir Androw has grantit togif his answer' outhir this nycht or to morn to the
ballies

In the court haldin be the aldirman and ballies of abirdene in the tolbuthe the last dai of the
moneth of aprile forsaid comperit maistir Androw cadiow togif his answer' as was or
danit yisterdai / and sayd he knew and vndirstude that he was in the assedacion of the
toune for half a net of the mydchingil / and sayd that he had ane obligacion of
certane personis of warandice of half a net of the Raik in interchange with the said demj
net of the mydchingil the quhilk matir dependis in the law and vndecidit be ane
assise / and gif he be made fra the said fisching of the Raik / quhethir he fisch the
said half net of the mydchingil or nocht he sal pay the mail tharof to the toune / Attour
the counsale and brethir of the gilde has ordanit / that gif the said action beis vnendit the
tyme of the rasing of the wattir malis that the said maistir Androw sal pay the mail of the
demj net of the mydchingil to the toune but demand'

the samen dai Androw branche balye and phil of Dunbrek seriand gerd gilbert riburn
and Dauid theman pryis' ane gold ring present to thaim be malcum lesly quhilk had it
in wed fra William moyses And thai prysit the said ryng til xxvj s' viij d'

the aldirman and consale has ordanit for amendis of the strublance of Jhone glenmalvin
made be Sym of gardyn / that the said Sym sal pay to the mastir of the kirk wark
x s' tobe deliuerit to the organar' / and j li' wax to the haly blude licht

Item that murtho glenmaluin for strublance of the said Sym and of the court sal pay in
like wys' x s' tobe gevin to the organar' and j pund of walx

The secund day of maij the yer' of god et cetera lxxxv Alexander chavmer seriand comperit
before the ballies in Jugement and of his awne free wil has resignit and owyrge
vyn his said office of seriandry for this yere

the same dai the aldirman and consale has ordanit / that William moyses sal sel the rema
nand of j pipe of rede gascon' wyne that is now in his tavern that was bocht
fra the skippar of the balingar' for vj d' the pynt til al thaim that likis toby of the sa
myn quhil the pipe be furth . And that nane vthir gascon' wyne that com in the said
schip at this tym salbe sald be ony nychtbour of this toun derrar than vj d' the pynt
And quha that dois the contrar' salbe punyst as law wil And that the said William
moyses sal pay to the organar' ten s' for the faute committit be him at this tyme

The ferd day of maij the yer' forsaid In the court haldin be the ballies of abirdene
in the tolbuthe James lesly and William blindsel in the name of the assise inquirit
at ser William cadiow procuratour til maistir Androw cadiou his brudir in Jugement
gif he couthe prefe that evir the seil of vmquhile Dauid colison was set to
the obligacion quhare the said Dauidis name is inserrit or that evyr the said Dauid
consentit to the making of the said obligacion And the said ser William as procura
tour said that he couthe preve na forthir than the obligacion proportit in the self

the samyn dai the assise beforewritin except Jhon' Wormot / and to thaim ekit Jhon'
of culan and Walter achnefe desirit be the assise togif thaim consel the gret aith sworn and riply avisit / has decre
tit and deliuerit be the mouthe of James lesly forspekar / that the obliga
cione producit be maistir Androw cadiow / anent the clame of warrandis' of
ane half nettis fisching of the Raik / is nocht complete and sufficient to
bynd the personis that maistir Androw cadiow requiris

The aldirman and consale has consentit / sa fer as Sym of gardyn has foundit his
dyke to the complete bigging of the samyn

The vj dai of maij / It is ordanit be the aldirman and consale that al the baxtaris of this
toune be weil furnyst of bakyn brede of quhete redy to serve the toun again
Sounday next tocum vndir the pain of secluding of thaim fra that craft for a yer'
that falyeis tharin et cetera

Item it is ordanit be the aldirman and counsale that na nichbur' or induellar' of this burgh
sal refuse totak plakkis for payment vnto the tym that thai here and be certifeit that
thai be cryit downe vndir the pane of the vnlaw tobe rasit but fauouris / and tobe
applijt to the organys

The x dai of maij the yer' of god et cetera lxxxv Androw litstar' the son of vmquhile Jhone
litstar' burges of abirdene Comperit before the ballies in Jugement and askit tobe
kend and assignit til a land liand in the castelgate on the north syde of that ilke be
tuix the land of Jhone chepman on the west part / and the land of alexander Watson on the
eist part / pertening til him heritably be the deces' of his said fadir / wppon the quhilk
the ballies avisit a diligent Inquisicion beand made the said ballies eftir the said
Inquisicion passit to the said land / token the said androw to the samyn as law of burgh
schawis . And the saidis ballies tuke Richart litstar souerty and the said land baith
that gif ony eldar ayr lachful com eftir him toclame the said land that the forsaid land
suld be furthcumand to the lachful ayr quhatsumevir his rycht beand knawyn
and the knawlage made til him suld be na preiudice til the lachful ayr gif
ony vthir beis And that the said androw in the menetyme sal nothir sel wedset nor
analy the said land quhil it be notourly knawin that thar be nane ayr than he
And gif he dois tobe of na force nor effect et cetera

The xxj day of maij the yer' forsaid In presence of Dauid menyes and Alexander rede twa of
the ballies of the burgh of abirdene Thomas symson and fyndlau fores burgez of the
said burgh has fundin souerty to the said ballies the said thomas for him self / his hand
land and gudis / and the said fyndlaw for him Robert blindsel Ilkane of thame for
fyve pundis for a schip that was prysit be man of leith for the some' of ten pundis
that is tosay James levingston' Jhon andirson and James talyour with vthiris the
gret aith sworn prysit hir for the said some' / and deliuerit that before the said ballies
quhilk schip was arrestit be the kingis lettres at the instance of the erle of ergile
and ordanit tobe prysit be the samyn lettrez . And fyndlau fores is oblist toreleve
Robert blindsel and tokepe him scathles of the said souerty be his hand land and gudis

The penult day of maij the yer' et cetera lxxxv Al and sindry merchandis that had gude and merchan
dis' in peter crawis schip quhilkis ar withhaldin beyond the sey / has consentit and grantit that
Dauid menyes balye and alexander trayl pass' to the feyr or ony vthir place that the gudis ar in
for the recovering of the said gudis and the inbringing of the samyn and todo thare deligence and
labouris tharfor lelely and treuly for the profite of the said merchandis And the saidis Dauid and
alexander salbe rewardit be the saidis merchandis ilkane pund / pundlike eftir as thare
gudis extendis to / And gif thare labouris and expens' be gret / thai salbe rewardit
thareftir / and gif thare labouris and expens' be smal tharin / thai salbe rewardit in siclike
wys' thareftir
